Do I need to preconvert my tokens to bridge from Ethereum to Verus?

No, you don't need to preconvert your tokens to bridge from Ethereum to Verus. You can skip the preconversion step when following the instructions for bridging from Ethereum to Verus using Verus Mobile or MetaMask.

# How to bridge from Ethereum to Verus

## Verus Mobile
Please read the first parts of [this article](https://medium.com/veruscoin/how-to-participate-in-the-verus-ethereum-bridge-launch-73aeeae1c76a). You can skip the part on preconverting.

## MetaMask
Please read the first parts of [this article](https://medium.com/veruscoin/how-to-participate-in-the-verus-ethereum-bridge-launch-73aeeae1c76a). You can skip the part on preconverting.
